response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000 based on your needs and expectations. My proposal is to offer this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that is significantly below its market value, ensuring a substantial savings for you.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
